entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
